/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering buildings and busy traffic. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a high level of vehicular activity. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the varied hues of the buildings and vehicles.
